context_bundle.summary: Future project: Carbyne as Meta-MCP proxy. Single MCP entry in Claude Desktop, compressed tool index, lazy-loads real servers on tools/call. Reduces context overhead from 119 full schemas to slim one-liners.

onboarding.quick_start: Convert Carbyne CLI/daemon into MCP server. Speaks JSON-RPC stdio. Returns slim tool index on tools/list. Proxies tools/call to real servers on-demand. Reduces tool definition overhead from ~15-20k tokens to ~2-3k. Requires rmcp stdio transport layer.
common_patterns: tools/list returns compressed index (~2-3k tokens vs ~15-20k)
tools/call routes to real server via process spawn
Lazy-load: full schema fetched only on first tool use
